text: Windows 2000 Server SP4 IIS 5.0 After looking at bug (enhancement request) 34577 I upgraded from JK 1.2.10 to 1.2.13 to take advantage of the better IIS logging. I installed the later (1.2.13) isapi_redirect.dll Restarted my IIS webserver Cleared the browser cache Requested a file through the browser (thankyou.jsp) Viewed my IIS log file. For the page requested there were multiple logging of the same files that are included in my requested HTML file. Example log file entries are as follows: #Fields: date time c-ip cs-username s-ip s-port cs-method cs-uri-stem cs-uri- query sc-status cs-bytes cs(User-Agent) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/thankyou.jsp - 200 425 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/survey.css - 200 379 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/general.js - 200 379 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/survey.css - 200 406 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/general.js - 200 407 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:43 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/general.js - 200 410 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) 2005-07-15 12:15:44 192.168.1.104 - 192.168.1.5 80 GET /survey/survey.css - 200 389 Mozilla/4.0+ (compatible;+MSIE+6.0;+Windows+NT+5.0;+formsPlayer+1.3;+.NET+CLR+1.1.4322) The requested file has for header and footer JSPs and in total (across the 3 JSPs) contains HTML tags to include an external javascript file, an external CSS file and has 54 tags (some duplicate images IE. 5 'spacer.gif's). I would expect to see logs for each of the non duplicated files (depending on cache settings). So. Although yes, the requested file (thankyou.jsp) is logged correctly, it seems the included files are not. I can provide any more information that is needed. Thanks, Alex
creator: alex@x-port.net

text:
Hi,

JK 1.2.13 version was never released.
Plese use the 1.2.14 version that will probably be votes as stable.
creator: mturk@apache.org
alex@x-port.net
text:
Hi.

I could not find any documentation that said the 1.2.13 release was stable or 
not except for asking on the TC users group. 

I still get the same results with the 1.2.14 release though.
